ForecastingGroup.name: ForecastingGroup
ForecastingGroup.description: Represents groups used to roll up forecast totals on the forecasts page.

DeveloperName.description: The developer (API) name of the forecast group.

DisplayPosition.description: The order in which forecasting dimensions are displayed on the forecasts page. Each value is unique to a dimension.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the forecast type associated with the forecasting group.

GroupField.description: The field name of the custom picklist used as a group. Possible values include custom, single-selection picklists available in SourceObject.

Language.description: The language of the custom picklist identified as the group.

MasterLabel.description: The label for this object, which displays in Setup. The label is in the default language locale for the organization. If thereâ€™s no default language locale, the label is in en_US.

SourceObject.description: The entity the picklist used for the forecast group is on.
